result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel P Reicher

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Documents verified with scanning; Paper file destroyed, retained electronically (scanned).
Def appears in custody & w/Atty. Anthony D Cotton.  Atty. Sandra Jo Giernoth for State.  Case previously dismissed and read in; case calendared for sentencing hearing on 14-CF-119.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Anthony D Cotton.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State.  State moves to dismiss and read in along with a plea to Cts. 1 and 2 in 14-CF-119.  Hearing scheduled for October 2, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
Reset Hearing from Br. 1 on 7-16-14 to Br. 3 on 7-31-14 at 8:15 for projected disposition with 14CF119.  Return to Br. I for scheduling if does not resolve.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Anthony D Cotton.  Atty Mandy A Schepper for State.  Clerk: EZ.  Atty. Cotton makes argument for Huber while on the cash bond.  State opposes any bail modification.  (14CF119, 14CM271 and 14TR703-Br. 3)  Atty. Cotton makes further argument, State is not aware of any authority for the request.  Court makes findings and denies bail motion.  Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.  Counsel states there may be a global resolution in Br. 3 and rqst. a bail modification hearing before Br. 3 for electronic monitoring.  Court advises counsel can make request before Br. 3.
Atty. Cotton rqst. to schedule Bail Motion, set on 6-24-14 at 3:00 p.m., same to notify.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Modification

Def appears in person in custody.  Atty Mark D Bensen for State.  Clerk: EZ.  Defendant unable to contact Atty. Cotton as does not accept collect calls.  (14CF119 & 14CM271 both Br. 3)  Preliminary hearing time limits waived.  Adjourned for position on preliminary hearing.  Defendant rqst. a signature bond so can get Huber, Court denies bail modification at this time and atty. can raise that issue.  Hearing scheduled for July 16, 2014 at 02:45 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel P Reicher
Current: 4047 Sunset Hill Rd, Hubertus, WI 53033 United States  (Effective: 05-28-2014)
Prior: 4654 Monches Rd, Colgate, WI 53017
Absolute sobriety; No contact with RV or her residence except one 20 minute visit to obtain personal effects in police company; Contact with children thru third party

Def appears in person in custody.  Atty Mark D Bensen for State.  Clerk: EZ.  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found.  (14CF119, 14CM271 and 14TR703 all Br. 3)  State rqst. $2,500-3,500.00 cash bond.  Defendant unable to post and rqst. signature bond so can remain employed.  Court orders $3,500.00 cash bond.  Defendant rqst. contact with his girlfriend, Court denies rqst.  PRELIM TIMING NOT WAIVED.  Adjourned to allow defendant to appear with an attorney. (Anthony Cotton)  Hearing scheduled for May 30, 2014 at 08:15 am.
